{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":173711,"originalJapaneseLine":"「追加でもーっと注いでやるぜ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll pour even more in!\""},{"lineNumber":173712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　せいぜい気持ちよさそうに喘ぎやがれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You better moan like it feels good!\""},{"lineNumber":173713,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐはぁっ！　ぐあぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh! Guaah hah hah hah hah!\""},{"lineNumber":173714,"originalJapaneseLine":"最早、抵抗する手段などなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"By now, there was no means of resistance,"},{"lineNumber":173715,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラはされるがまま犯される。","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla was violated as she was, without protest."},{"lineNumber":173716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐひゃっ！　ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guhya! Gua hah hah hah hah!\""},{"lineNumber":173717,"originalJapaneseLine":"部屋が、ケイブリスの笑い声で埋め尽くされた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The room was filled with Cavebris' laughter."},{"lineNumber":173718,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベズドグ山を外から見ている魔物達が","translatedEnglishLine":"The monsters watching Mount Bezudog from outside"},{"lineNumber":173719,"originalJapaneseLine":"何かを恐れるようにひそひそと話す。","translatedEnglishLine":"whispered to each other as if afraid of something."},{"lineNumber":173720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、どうなってやがんだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, what's going on,"},{"lineNumber":173721,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日のベズドグ山は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mount Bezudog today...\""},{"lineNumber":173722,"originalJapaneseLine":"本来ならとっくに終わっている筈の火砕流。","translatedEnglishLine":"The pyroclastic flow was supposed to have ended long ago."},{"lineNumber":173723,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、今日に限っては、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, today in particular,"},{"lineNumber":173724,"originalJapaneseLine":"噴火は収まらず尚激しさを増して、","translatedEnglishLine":"the eruption did not subside but grew even more intense,"},{"lineNumber":173725,"originalJapaneseLine":"マグマを噴き出し続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"continuing to spew magma."},{"lineNumber":173726,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで、ケイブリスの怒りに呼応するように。","translatedEnglishLine":"As if responding to Cavebris' anger."},{"lineNumber":173727,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がケイブリスの部屋の前に辿り着いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others arrived in front of Cavebris' room."},{"lineNumber":173728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケイブリスは今もこの中だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cavebris is still inside this room."},{"lineNumber":173729,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心の友、いけるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"My trusted friend, can you go in?\""},{"lineNumber":173730,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":173731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、確かにさっきは負けた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh heh, I certainly lost earlier.\""},{"lineNumber":173732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、今度は俺様の部下も増えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But this time, my subordinates have increased."},{"lineNumber":173733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽勝だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's an easy win.\""},{"lineNumber":173734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes...\""},{"lineNumber":173735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今度こそ、きっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Surely, this time for sure...\""},{"lineNumber":173736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、待って下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, please!\""},{"lineNumber":173737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「み、美樹ちゃんが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mi-Miki-chan is...\""},{"lineNumber":173738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":173739,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が健太郎に肩を借りなければいけないほど","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki was so weakened that she had to lean on Kentaro's shoulder."},{"lineNumber":173740,"originalJapaneseLine":"衰弱していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"She was debilitated."},{"lineNumber":173741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、大丈夫、大丈夫♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, I'm fine, I'm fine♪\""},{"lineNumber":173742,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぜんぜん元気だよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm totally fine...\""},

{"lineNumber":173743,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh...\""},

{"lineNumber":173744,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔王の気が、本人がどう抑えようとしても、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon Lord's aura, no matter how she tried to suppress it,"},

{"lineNumber":173745,"originalJapaneseLine":"自然と溢れ出していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"naturally overflowed."},

{"lineNumber":173746,"originalJapaneseLine":"「恐瘴気の影響、でしょうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Could it be the influence of the fear miasma...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173747,"originalJapaneseLine":"「薬も万能じゃない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Medicines aren't万能 (all-powerful/omniscient) either."},

{"lineNumber":173748,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多少は影響も受ける」","translatedEnglishLine":"They have some effect on her.\" "},

{"lineNumber":173749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王様はパワーはともかく、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Demon Lord, regardless of power,"},

{"lineNumber":173750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中身は普通の女の子と聞きます。","translatedEnglishLine":"is said to be an ordinary girl inside."},

{"lineNumber":173751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それなら、尚更です」","translatedEnglishLine":"If that's the case, it's even more so.\" "},

{"lineNumber":173752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-uh...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173753,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が自分の両肩を抱いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Miki held her own shoulders,"},

{"lineNumber":173754,"originalJapaneseLine":"呻き声を漏らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"letting out groans."},

{"lineNumber":173755,"originalJapaneseLine":"（やだ……だめだよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(No... it’s not good...)"},

{"lineNumber":173756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪い子は……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Bad children...) "},

{"lineNumber":173757,"originalJapaneseLine":"（健太郎くんも……みんなも……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Kentaro-kun too... everyone...) "},

{"lineNumber":173758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うしさんも……花さんも……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Ushi-san... Hana-san...) "},

{"lineNumber":173759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたし、みんなだいすきなの……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I love you all so much...) "},

{"lineNumber":173760,"originalJapaneseLine":"（だから……だから私に……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(So... so please don’t let me...) "},

{"lineNumber":173761,"originalJapaneseLine":"（わたしに壊させないで……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(destroy myself...) "},

{"lineNumber":173762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173763,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎がそっと美樹を抱きしめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro gently embraced Miki."},

{"lineNumber":173764,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、大丈夫」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's okay, it's okay.\" "},

{"lineNumber":173765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けんたろう、くん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kentaro-kun...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173766,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、大丈夫」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's okay, it's okay.\" "},

{"lineNumber":173767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だいじょぶ、だいじょぶ……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, it's okay...\" "},

{"lineNumber":173769,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe\" "},

{"lineNumber":173770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「追加でもーっと注いでやるぜ！
せいぜい気持ちよさそうに喘ぎやがれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You better moan like it feels good!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐはぁっ！　ぐあぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
最早、抵抗する手段などなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, there was no means of resistance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラはされるがまま犯される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla was violated as she was, without protest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐひゃっ！　ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
部屋が、ケイブリスの笑い声で埋め尽くされた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The room was filled with Cavebris' laughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベズドグ山を外から見ている魔物達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters watching Mount Bezudog from outside

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かを恐れるようにひそひそと話す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: whispered to each other as if afraid of something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、どうなってやがんだ、
本来ならとっくに終わっている筈の火砕流。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pyroclastic flow was supposed to have ended long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、今日に限っては、
噴火は収まらず尚激しさを増して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the eruption did not subside but grew even more intense,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マグマを噴き出し続ける。
まるで、ケイブリスの怒りに呼応するように。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if responding to Cavebris' anger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がケイブリスの部屋の前に辿り着いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others arrived in front of Cavebris' room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケイブリスは今もこの中だ。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My trusted friend, can you go in?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふん、確かにさっきは負けた」
「だが、今度は俺様の部下も増えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But this time, my subordinates have increased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が健太郎に肩を借りなければいけないほど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miki was so weakened that she had to lean on Kentaro's shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の気が、本人がどう抑えようとしても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Lord's aura, no matter how she tried to suppress it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然と溢れ出していた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Could it be the influence of the fear miasma..."
They have some effect on her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王様はパワーはともかく、
中身は普通の女の子と聞きます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is said to be an ordinary girl inside.
If that's the case, it's even more so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が自分の両肩を抱いて、
わたし、みんなだいすきなの……）
健太郎がそっと美樹を抱きしめた。
だいじょぶ、だいじょぶ……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:
